document_title: Angina: A warning sign of a potential heart attack
subsection_name: dau-that-nguc.json_2_Who is at risk of angina?
subsection_title: dau that nguc.json. Who is at risk of angina?
subsection_data:
dau that nguc.json. Who is at risk of angina?
Anyone can have angina due to many different causes, but pain will appear more often in the following subjects:
Elderly;; People with high blood pressure;; People with blood lipid disorders (dyslipidemia);; People with diabetes;; Smokers, obese, unhealthy lifestyle;
Obese people are at high risk of angina attacks.
